feed.title: Lidarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.1.7.4030
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

Changes:

  • 7f0fab0cf6e3ce44a18495fcbe1b24d75c1e4a8b Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • d68f207e9b1b9157b94e7bbaa0bf898135dc624d Ignore spotify mapping test temporarily
  • f1efd052078f3d5378c8993b988cf8f8ef5b03d3 Fixed: Spotify Playlist selection
  • 59efffd40fd603a8782786cb59dd5337de3bc8f8 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 6c90ac74e9817d43650582f26b77b6d78815669b Fixed: Don't use sub folder to check for free disk space for update [ #4566 ]
  • f5eee5219445b826cfb2719f8b8153d44961fe31 New: Log database engine version on startup
  • 0871949b740adf3fa86b17ffddc49bd265a190a8 Fixed: Redirecting after login
  • 1536e900533a20b525fcd5110a349faed04203db New: Artist info in Album Delete event for Webhooks [ #4552 ]
  • c744231141147b05e4eedd939e1688d51050e782 Translations for settings index
  • efe0a3d283e93cb1d14c5408b940b9a7e84081b0 Typings cleanup and improvements [ #3516, #3510, #2778 ]
  • 8e5942d5c5ca5833739cb3b3d25d37a032ec9f1f Parse Exception Release Groups [ #4541, #4327, #4250, #3221, #2658 ]
  • 6471353bcd9b4effaa07ead7f976582a3174ba0a Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • c3c50498bdca6a08ea40d5446e0e466204038f45 Debian Install Script [ #4382, #4383, #4401, #4407, #4423, #4474 ]
  • 6ae99acea7be10533515a3ad4c16c0864997019a Fix tests for storing last search time for albums
  • d8066ec17278e8dc78f6d8b408ae987a1241ddeb New: Size column for albums [ #3292 ]
  • a9b16d298f86d2c2ca0e44aeb2d9d51b66d6404f Improve CF calculation for files without scene name [ #3359 ]
  • 0bdd5f3278eb29be813d494fa855917a862e1a98 Fixed: A potential issue when extra files for multiple artists have the same relative path [ #2760 ]
  • 2f0d02b3bc2996d428a1f9e61a35a3f528143cf9 Allow Discography to be grabbed automatically if all albums will be released within 24 hours [ #3181 ]
  • abefdca0fcdbc7e2f2c7fa8a3c2958737d31e4a4 Fix Missing/CutoffUnmet search all warnings
  • 2fc966af0c526a3e75a0bf523225b98dcfc21a42 New: Missing/Cutoff Unmet searches will search for albums that haven't been searched recently first [ #3250 ]
  • 5d8f9c9e274e5ac2fe8d348b7e081fa13dc04674 New: Store last search time for AlbumSearch
  • 0bcbf9df81afe4ca349eed0a68d04a4a75908347 Fixed: Don't convert artist/album selection filter to lower case in state [ #1857 ]
  • 49883d0e30e65dbd0ac28547864ca685e6f9ce34 Add some translations for artist table index
  • 09e9162aa6860fa788ac014dc468e035e1b38e0f Automated API Docs update
  • d38c44d25e5cdbf51027e0cd3a2bfb5c56ccc71f New: Option to disable cover art embed in files (#4547) [ #2488 ]
  • 3702fa773c28441ad570889f14084a1bb88a6cc0 New: Filter by Monitor New Items [ #3707 ]
  • aecf5bba49fb736293c79ca310ec5b6582dcc928 Fixed: Correctly map artist logos to clearlogo type [ #2627 ]
  • 6e43d8a4fea12b094486e79b7b90cde1943f43ff New: Ability to import aiff files [ #4102 ]
  • 2a8c67badcb10d2d74480167a9d7f5e8fee1a635 New: Preserve replaygain tags
  • 0121095b3e4761f4f91eed7bf94932d71ce7a874 New: Add additional CleanNameThe/CleanTitleThe naming tokens [ #4197 ]
  • 2f80957f11fd5ab735c030c574e228a7bd320847 Bump version to 2.1.7
  • 1775dc9fa867cc0def0b67debcf44baa40dd1c50 Fixed: Ensure first history item when marked as failed is the selected item [ #3557 ]
  • cf33d433a40569da227c0fc1357c15ba286166eb New: Additional tooltips for icon buttons [ #4183 ]
  • fcfd4e401e2246f1b838a5e76fce0424f4d3e5b7 Improve UI notice for delayed queue items [ #4242 ]
  • 8c6f0d10e9fe33e9e6604bf2a9b6ce6e25e0e835 Rename instances of Profile to QualityProfile [ #4245 ]
  • 7388e3fb66e17e39d636f8c77881e7a82a25c17c Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • f7418d61744fd98b9a89203f69a1569aecd83a6f New: Sort root folders by path [ #4280, #3956 ]
  • dec241e6b659e871223151f6ecddf4d6b5e2149a Improve Release Grabbing & Failure Logging [ #4534 ]
  • ef8aeda3b591c4823840c2ac63c84ed8098f76db Fixed: Avoid import loop for already imported albums [ #4231 ]
  • 408e05292e95af33c7fca093df0f0288ae49744f Fixed: Don't reimport the same files from the same release unless grabbed again [ #4050 ]
  • 57ac45fd8ec4b0ab6ed1f9f667e0752256651a6c Fixed: Naming validation when using max token length
  • 18fc1de451230724b81c1c85b0b627a998d184e6 Add max token length (including ellipsis) for some tokens
  • 24b8029d2e4a8aa5a42b2fbb70283a02cef3e4e8 Fixed: Release Year in renaming format for certain OS language cultures
  • c3eda6ff12bbd534573e3a08cb5ba38fc4452b4e Only bind shortcut for pending changes confirmation when it's shown
  • ba90095a472803cbd077b021326c379bd5ed6f4a Automated API Docs update
  • ecb37b8378220c2d0e8cd9a28a01badf8fd8d599 Fixed: Showing already imported tracks as downloading in Artists index
  • af12fad1859d033069af28b752bf37852c8b84fb New: Show downloading status for artist progress bar
  • f1dede240da945e9fc7b2e7170e67ba5bb1f16c0 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • bc671124eff144b62786c057af05c677eade16f7 Automated API Docs update
  • 82d1fc1a81d6dbaf7b52c4f3474c6d82c95ee9f0 Fixed: Monitored status being reset after refresh when artist is edited manually
  • 545e17de49dccbe2bae98857ead284f017d000aa Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • a9521d1b684849c6d8830137c5cf0f9fb6959c85 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 56d9dc4c7c4ef9a7d799d79be8a74a0c8ec83969 New: Show error message for pending queue items without albums [ #3512 ]
  • 5f9c616bff6ff4006fa7ea9b4f76677e8946bb80 New: On Artist Add connection event [ #3531 ]
  • f31ecaf03e0a158330853368498f79cdbbb5ca75 Bump version to 2.1.6
  • 3b0da3aac68aa94a53d7f43fc933bbd738a739fe Multiple Translations updated by Weblate

  • c9faf83b0bf1a597a814e1d30e6c888780cd031f Fixed: Allow restore to process backups up to ~1000MB [ #4513 ]
  • a3504b5e32c77ebf9998edc82c9959beb2f96aa8 Prevent parsing for Roksbox metadata detection if not a matching extension
  • 76b6359732f4fc6261247e8d743906d090f37dd3 Prevent parsing for Wdtv metadata detection if not a matching extension

  • 6517485e0fc2fea778b7227775e6b556bb819f05 New: Optionally remove from queue by changing category to 'Post-Import Category' when configured [ #4510 ]
  • 6a1fbd64b46b1c4d4cc56f7e4e1a8c198e14227d Update database migration version translation token [ #4507 ]
  • 4a5cd2098b153f0a2d2521b9723e740b16c5856f Add Regular Expression Custom Format translation [ #4506 ]
  • 7ff23ccadb740fd7e748f20238deede8c5a9f3ff New: Add download client name to pending items waiting for a specific client [ #4504 ]

  • aa98bb16e9b1dd496bd8286661a2df5222ceb677 Fixed: Artists poster view on mobile devices

entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.2.5.4141
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

Changes:

  • 3071977284bf0a158b0fd0ca74c24fccd7f15214 Add DevContainer, VSCode config and extensions.json [ #4740 ]
  • b14e2bb6180c22c60fb795fc455708d5a470d5a0 New: Auto tag artists based on tags present/absent on artists [ #4742 ]
  • 8c09c0cb5c8801bb9dac699315d9a2ffa4e177e6 New: Option to prefix app name on Telegram notification titles [ #4739 ]
  • 8cebb21c2d4eb2100e2ce7dd315ad18656b772da Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 74ac263b7435325c0e2329e5026ef1d7ab4a0751 New: Detect shfs mounts in disk space
  • adcec90ef81c48a596d6fcb21c9aeecd1b0ce5be Fixed: Sorting by Artist Name in Missing/Cutoff Unmet under Postgres [ #4736, #3392, #4374 ]
  • daf8b94c8e95a53823640532cb6050855881114c Added table identifier to OrderBy to avoid column ambiguity on joins [ #3993 ]
  • 7c4f0c597efe077a2c848d9c00c10da989fd167d Bump version to 2.2.5
  • 1d2af2aab4474d05501dd7cf3044a96e64561300 Fix translation for indexer priority help text
  • 5d537689fba07d8252b49c92189bc745971daa87 New: Informational text on Custom Formats modal [ #4729 ]
See More * ca6beea62bc11afd8b1b1aee2d11b12c44de09cb Fixed: Use widely supported display mode for PWA * a82c9190936d05416a56b9757a1d90f3d2ce7b7d Fixed: Cleanse BHD RSS key in log files * 2941e0c4b7fdbe50bc1464744d9dc2a047b766d1 Fixed: Sending ntfy.sh notifications with unicode characters * ca0b900d928ccb4c1e5d256fc7f8dab0d259901f Fixed: (Gazelle) Ignore ineligible releases with Use Freeleech Token * 72f1b2075b8472628707035e30bf5e83161ad716 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * e847828191bcc57444cd20fb432264742328bfbf Fixed: Album release selection in manual import * 2a10505dff0ec398e9052fc82404f8e76e4246e6 Bump skipping spotify tests * 28f2eb974d72148e79b388e11be0edc78d95a870 Fixed: Task with removed artists causing error [ #4696 ] * 13ce040e4d0e9a12be58dcf55df0d6c7c643a009 Automated API Docs update * f477f9b287733fcda58174d05505fcc84a4dca6b Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 0e840086691de70c9f97ec1583f8d52963163542 New: Advanced settings toggle in import list, notification and download client modals * 52b5ff6fddbe0ae19172786fa8cf4af9a7a2cd4a Fixed: Exceptions when checking for routable IPv4 addresses * 1d0de5191782e756486b223d6220f479a6fa7185 Fixed: qBittorrent not correctly handling retention during testing * a8648fdb71046f188b75dc18f2b638ad0ab88d2a Fixed: Handling torrents with relative path in entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.3.3.4204
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

Changes:

  • febb3ef4858efef549377b2c3f54b3479f88bec8 Bump Npgsql to 7.0.7
  • 30d9891bf0ee4dd126cb5a4211cd85c68c9156c0 New: Optionally use Environment Variables for settings in config.xml
  • 2621acdae5a5a9f1e32924e444d018388344dfd4 Minor translations to album interactive search
  • 18772553f2ba285f8d6c750a086b7261f7880a8a Fallback value for statistics
  • 0300bf2dd28b52b40ee404348b0bd3b03730851c Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 77861e4303783d7c62d96db55448d26f87d6b901 Refactor PasswordInput to use type password
  • 3545a7451e4ba9c8eba4229fedfb24492a01c5af Fixed: Text color for inputs on login page
  • 9f8c4530cabc761e84d1c6006bd29d7bb8191b2d New: Dark theme for login screen [ #4798 ]
  • 9da690f807b3476b86cb6b3b7a1d11a8fa243104 New: Support stoppedUP and stoppedDL states from qBittorrent [ #4795 ]
  • 31f342b8ad370cf7ba4f3a07cf80303d7c441c48 Use number input for seed ratio [ #4802 ]
See More * 596a36d45ff8444fbe9dad0a182c154be5f2ea62 Fixed: Notifications with only On Rename enabled * 94bb8a436b88dde3ceef191f7052e7d055d8b47d Fixed: Parsing long downloading/seeding values from Transmission * 94d2a20b6a79306fc3075d5dd9ad3c6dee4f39a9 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * a25e5aae1094f5158a8afe0a1a61cdd1ac637ad0 Fixed: Indexer flags for torrent release pushes * f4a02ffc838ae9336082c6b65cf2f6ba37e47394 Forward X-Forwarded-Host header * 1bdcf910146d2088b1a4f349fff65dd4c80ac587 Bump version to 2.3.3 * 4d28d3f25a5465c421b1d9161c8841015626001c Fixed: Initialize databases after app folder migrations * 9660ec37cd7756b8026a9c4597fc8fffec853a42 Use newer Node.js task for in pipelines * 66c7521f4b0baf7a6086246a28c497acd5f25120 Fixed: Limit titles in task name to 10 artists [ #4777 ] * 8b57b33c9912537c4606f90756c1e89bcc6f7e9c New: Don't initially select 0 byte files in Interactive Import [ #4776 ] * 580e4becbe6cab467960f966a42328929909c25c Fixed: Improve paths longer than 256 on Windows failing to hardlink * 5f248aa25ea9acf40685a2f1d621a982bb8bafae New: Remove qBitorrent torrents that reach inactive seeding time * a735eccb6503eb540e3797a4c3ddae88554f46c3 Bump version to 2.3.2 * d11ed42830a8ec2e926b4cd5936ea04a69396cc3 Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * b0038dd1437e779ce49481e414251ef31247e6ae Fixed: Retrying download on not suppressed HTTP errors * 2e242aeb7baad9b5229c9eaa64eb2cddc6d6930f Database corruption message linking to wiki * 416d50531636f23a1243e24b89891d4858b432c7 Bump dotnet to 6.0.29 * 4816f3525628c977f488a9d5f969be5e353f2350 Bump typescript eslint plugin and parser * e42e0a72ebab124b6fab8db2039ae76420d434a4 Add dev container workspace [ #4756 ] * db9e62f79d4374755764ca2a248dd8a466f01c76 Convert store selectors to Typescript [ #3937 ] * bc69fa48420edf45da27aac2e7ce6d13496098b4 Bump frontend dependencies * 86dad72c494ffd82150cea3dd260c3f7aa378cc3 Bump version to 2.3.1 * 4a8d6c367d979ed3ade634682035e8671ee9b672 Bump skipping spotify tests * c1926f8758cdb222fd7861ff591a2943c36e729b Fixed: Skip move when source and destination are the same * 7820bcf91f65992cd1e4e1f81c00091d2dbf3cc8 Bump SixLabors.ImageSharp to 3.1.4 * 431ad0a028720461b351fe46054568b0437d86b1 Automated API Docs update * 59cf7a95c38283d68b944397f5ac576780b9d2b4 Fixed: Re-testing edited providers will forcibly test them * e17e3633f88b6cf36878f6a8dd9231629adbd8d4 Don't block task queue for queued update task for Rescan Folders [ #4551 ] * 46da2b49c6df6a0e78c2570e976db5adefe35e96 Bump version to 2.3.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Lidarr/43582661-9ac3-4ec6-9583-209885d5ff34/_release?releaseId=84&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.4.3.4248
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

Changes:

  • 4d693f78f3be72a87dfb17bab1d5d5e34061ec0c Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
  • 2dec783272409799fced8d7c2260e1bb5781ba51 Fixed: Creating root folders without default tags [ #4898 ]
  • 9045dea5364ff8a0677adc25e478e908e6b0ee11 Update SonarCloud pipeline versions
  • 2ad7396f6db5c2dfcb9e5b584f92650567cabb43 New: Added UI for parsing release names
  • bcfabacbd47f7205ce0d5abfaacefeffacfdfa48 Bump version to 2.4.3
  • bfcbb67054d0664bb334188ed309ef0bdea7984f Fixed: Already imported downloads appearing in Queue briefly [ #4877 ]
  • bc19ead182dc06678ce51152bb64ccf72d8681d8 Bump version to 2.4.2
  • 39a5abd5ae867a6c58590ae56bc504b703b4454a Bump skipping spotify tests
  • e31f2ad2536fd0ab868a9a22f3bf0c2c0b8a37f4 Fixed: Validate metadata and quality profiles for root folders
  • 838e49ba232e6535cb56acbd4fcff69dd20e1bc6 Bump mac image to 12
See More * 47b5bbc9e1e7867d747b7449ba8f7b6091daaaa4 Fixed: Exclude invalid releases from Newznab and Torznab parsers * d602f38b7d1fc7e09f4d74a8fd245928f8e0e811 New: Ignore Deluge torrents without a title * e8ab1f842b1168ba7605357a58bfb3fd82e5470f Bump version to 2.4.1 * 959f6be019c05d65ff272c2c65f854eeef5d4001 Ignore `Grabbed` with STJson [ #4824 ] * ceca76d7c078291adbcabe43d48b96f35c227be0 Automated API Docs update * 3b0f9500a882f6e1d30b2a36f56e026246cd195a Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 9eda077c03ad7933974811fb573beb420a57a939 Ignore `Grabbed` from API docs [ #4847 ] * 4832860cce89cb019fb05d79b6bf2226e97ae8d0 Rename Sonarr to Lidarr * 448d29f1352cc5b05df4735cf8c33bbec5d3e1a8 Fixed: Improve error messaging if config file isn't formatted correctly * 7d46360c34ab7c9897cacb9cbd23f47ab54f68ef Fixed: Ignore case when resolving indexer by name in release push * 4752b54e26978c6eadbd1ea05c950941c8f3c2b9 Fixed: Ignore case for name validation in providers * 17bf73d1ef4aa3180ad9fb7e238c3f373b75b8da Multiple Translations updated by Weblate * 6ec298ed2a9653863b8cea33e7174d50d37b5fcc Fixed: Trimming slashes from UrlBase when using environment variable * 563db9231eb0a8053f8dc890d44a246d48d964d6 Update the wanted section for missing and cutoff unmet * d27b062d6acb86832b3f564d838bd2762865aec7 Bump version to 2.4.0 This list of changes was [auto generated](https://dev.azure.com/Lidarr/43582661-9ac3-4ec6-9583-209885d5ff34/_release?releaseId=92&_a=release-summary).

entry.title: New release for Lidarr: 2.5.3.4341
entry.content:
To receive further updates for a non-docker installation, please change the branch to master. (Settings -> General (Show Advanced Settings) -> Updates -> Branch)

If you are using docker you will need to update the container image. Do not attempt to update Lidarr within an existing docker container. Doing so will prevent audio fingerprinting from working and break your Lidarr installation if you ever delete and re-create the container.

Changes:

  • 1dee2aaf808d65021750e6c0baff89245fd597a8 Fix tests
  • f024dad65f6288c66ff98b28f07bd086a7e29097 Bump workflow actions

  • af4eeeb8931f1148d10254507a6eea86da754ba7 Don't persist value for SslCertHash when checking for existence
  • 7738ee78c81ad68cb8d5ed8b34945e065269fc61 Automated API Docs update

  • bb6528c104ecb722e85b8f5f74d8f64dd6a967aa Upgrade nlog to 5.3.3 [ #4980 ]
  • f49388f3c4e78f776a729285050e4c46c79735ff Fixed: Ensure Root Folder exists when Adding Artist [ #5041 ]
